로그인에러: You have entered an incorrect username or password. Please check your information and try again.
주문접수실패설명: Please take a photo and apply for KakaoTalk consultation.
미사용테이블선택: There are no orders received from table %{tableName}
주문 접수 실패 안내 부가: Please take a photo and request a consultation via KakaoTalk.
주문 내역 로딩: Please wait while we load your order information.
이용중테이블없음: There are no tables in use.
검색어: Please enter the title or content.
전화번호확인: Please check your mobile phone number.
메시지발송: A KakaoTalk message with an attached file was sent to %{phone_number}.
테이블 비우기 설명: Do you want to delete the order history of table %{tableName}?
테이블 비우기 완료: The order history for table %{tableName} has been cleared.
테이블 비우기 실패: The order details for table %{tableName} could not be cleared.
대분류 노출 설명: Select whether or not to sell the corresponding first category on the order tablet.
중분류 노출 설명: Select the second category you want to sell in the ordering tablet.
분류 노출 토스트: %{categoryName} is sold on the ordering tablet.
분류 숨김 토스트: %{categoryName} was hidden in the order tablet.
상태 변경 잠금 토스트: You cannot change the sale status. Please inquire with the franchise headquarters.
판매 상태 설명1: If you do not have the option to select from the required options,
판매 상태 설명2: we will not be able to accept your %{product} order.
옵션 품절 토스트: %{optionName} has been changed to sold out.
옵션 판매 토스트: %{optionName} has been changed to sale status.
옵션 컨펌 모달 내용: If %{group_name} doesn't have enough options to choose from, we won't be able to take your order for %{goodsName}.
스티커 변경 설명: Please select the elements you want to display in the product list.
옵션판매설명: You must sell more than %{count} units to place an order.
태블릿 화면 설명: You can turn on or off the store's tablet screen.
태블릿 주문 설명: Controls availability of orders on your tablet.
주문 내역 설명: Controls whether the order details button is displayed on the tablet.
케이블 연결 알림 설명: When the power or card reader cable is not connected to the tablet, a notification will be generated on the tablet.
주문하기 설명: We are taking new and additional orders.
픽업 요청 설명: After confirming your order, request pickup.
픽업요청 메세지: Would you like to request pickup for table %{table_name}?
주류 주문 설명: Prevents alcohol products from being exposed on the specified table.
주문 오류 내역 설명: Check the details of errors that occurred when ordering.
주문 내역 설정 설명: Set the order history to display.
주문별 정보 보기 설명: Check your order history at the table.
결제 보류 처리 설명: If payment cannot be completed due to store circumstances, payment will be held.
결제 내역 설명: Check the approved/cancelled payment history in the table.
결제 주문 강제 취소 설명: If payment cannot be completed due to store circumstances, both order and payment will be canceled.
타이머 메시지 설명: Create a timer message to display on the ordering tablet.
타이머 삭제 안내:
Are you sure you want to delete?
Deleted timers cannot be recovered.
타이머 빈 리스트 안내: There are no registered timer messages.
타이머 등록 개수 제한: You can register up to 5 items.
글자 수 초과 안내: Please write the instructions within 40 characters.
금지어 안내: The message cannot be registered because it contains *%{invalidText}*.
동일 시간 오류 안내: The start time and end time are set the same.
종료 시간 오류 안내: The end time is set to be in the past than the start time.
겹침 시간 오류 안내: There is already a registered message at %{time}. Please change the message time.
등록 완료: A timer message has been registered.
시간 설정 설명: You can set the exposure start time and end time.
종료 시간 선택 오류: Please set the start time first.
테이블 게임 설명: Manages games played at the table.
서빙 로봇 설명: Manage the serving robots in use in the store.
언어설정 설명: Select the default language for your master tablet.

글자 크기 변경 안내: Preview the screen applied to the master tablet.
테마 선택 설명: Select a theme for your master tablet.

주문취소 토스트: Order number %{order_sequence} has been changed to cancelled.
매장선택 설정 설명: Select the store you want to apply to the master.
로그아웃 설명: Log out of your master tablet account.
